title: Particle diagram when 4 molecules H2O2 decompose

content.question: Which of the following particle diagrams best represents the products when four molecules of H2O2(l) decompose into water and oxygen gas at room temperature?

choices.label: The figure presents a particle diagram containing 4 H 2 molecules and 4 O 2 molecules.
The figure presents a particle diagram containing 8 individual H atoms and 8 individual O atoms.
The figure presents a particle diagram containing 2 H 2 molecules and 4 H 2 O molecules.
The figure presents a particle diagram containing 2 O 2 molecules and 4 H 2 O molecules.

content.answer: The figure presents a particle diagram containing 2 O 2 molecules and 4 H 2 O molecules.

skill.text: 5.E: Determine a balanced chemical equation for a given chemical phenomenon.
